author: tqpcharlie
content: could this cause problems with the merge if this group (https://www.ethereumgenesys.org/) is planning to keep the PoW chain going at the merge fork?

author: pietjepuk
content: Should be perfectly fine. My own 10 Ethereum forks are also alive and kicking if you're interested in those

author: pietjepuk
content: The most annoying thing would be long reorgs ("attack"), but just keeping the PoW chain alive after the merge is not that

author: potuz
content: It's probably better that there are such groups as they'll keep hashing right up to the merge
